title: This Video Of Anil Kapoor Running As Fast As A Bullet Is Making People Say ‘Kamaal Ho Sir’!
text:
This Video Of Anil Kapoor Running As Fast As A Bullet Is Making People Say ‘Kamaal Ho Sir’!

This Video Of Anil Kapoor Running As Fast As A Bullet Is Making People Say ‘Kamaal Ho Sir’!

He has defied the laws of ageing. He is growing younger with age. Ageing like a fine wine, is he? No, he is ageing in reverse, we say!

Anil Kapoor doesn’t only look young and handsome, he is also fit and fabulous.

Twitter

So, to wish Karva Chauth to his fans and wife, he posted a video of himself running like a bullet it in.

All your love, prayers and fasting is making me run faster & keeping me healthy today and everyday! 😍 Happy karva chauth 🙏🏻 pic.twitter.com/mbY35sxQO3 — Anil Kapoor (@AnilKapoor) October 17, 2019

That was indeed quite a bizarre wish, but fans couldn’t help praise was his fitness.

For the unversed, he is 62-years-old. Yeah, you can take a moment to gulp that fact down. Also, can you guess who's father and who's son in the picture below.

Twitter

Don't Miss 41.5 K SHARES 140 SHARES 28 K SHARES 16.3 K SHARES

Fans were left panting by just seeing this video.

Killing it tiger ! — Mohit Suri (@mohit11481) October 17, 2019

This is LIT, sir. — Monica Yadav 💜 (@MonicaYadav08) October 17, 2019

kya daur lagai hai londo ne — Pradeep kashyap (@Pradeep75640542) October 17, 2019

All Same age people seeing this pic.twitter.com/yfBRCkSpru — IMS (@sharmaijii) October 17, 2019

And they also couldn’t stop praising his cameraman who was running as fast as he was. They showered praises upon him too.

Also when ur PR team is also maintaining their fitness by running with you — Sanjiv B (@SanjivB4) October 17, 2019

Wow.. You're so fit but your camera person is also running very fast. He must be very fit.

Happy Karwa chauth — Deepak Chaurasia (@deepkchaurasia) October 17, 2019

A man with a camera is running as fast as you. — Zia Ur Rehman (@Z_UR17) October 17, 2019

Appreciate efforts of person with Camera...👏👏 — Pankaj V Patil (@PankajVPatil4) October 17, 2019

And Anil Kapoor wasn’t on the only one who shared hilarious video to wish Karva Chauth. Amitabh Bachchan posted a beautiful black and white photo on Karva Chauth but he cropped himself in it. “The better half”, he wrote in the caption.

T 3520 - .. the better half .. !! 🌹

quite obviously the other half is irrelevant .. and therefore unseen 🤣🤣🤣 pic.twitter.com/0Fivuw5cwY — Amitabh Bachchan (@SrBachchan) October 17, 2019

Happy Karva Chauth!
